trans-unit.source: Dynamically hit tests a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> with a lasso.
trans-unit.target: Realiza testes de clique dinamicamente em um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> com um Laço.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester> hit tests strokes by determining whether a lasso path surrounds it.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester> faz testes traços, determinando se um caminho de Laço ao seu redor.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester.AddPoints%2A> method in the stylus events to add the points to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester>.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester.AddPoints%2A> método nos eventos de caneta para adicionar os pontos para a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester>.

trans-unit.source: When the points added to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester> selects or unselects a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>, the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester> raises the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester.SelectionChanged> event
trans-unit.target: Quando os pontos é adicionada para o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester> marca ou desmarca uma <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>, o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester> gera o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester.SelectionChanged> evento

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to dynamically select strokes in a custom control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como selecionar traços dinamicamente em um controle personalizado.

trans-unit.source: For the entire sample, see [How to: Select Ink from a Custom Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-select-ink-from-a-custom-control.md)
trans-unit.target: Para o exemplo completo, consulte [como: selecionar tinta de um controle personalizado](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-select-ink-from-a-custom-control.md)

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the lasso path selects or unselects an ink <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o caminho de Laço marca ou desmarca um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> de tinta.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to dynamically select strokes in a custom control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como selecionar traços dinamicamente em um controle personalizado.

trans-unit.source: For the entire sample, see [How to: Select Ink from a Custom Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-select-ink-from-a-custom-control.md)
trans-unit.target: Para o exemplo completo, consulte [como: selecionar tinta de um controle personalizado](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-select-ink-from-a-custom-control.md)
